name: Lost Necklace
dialogue: My wife's necklace was stolen by those wretched murlocs! I saw one of them wearing something shiny. Please, retrieve it for me. The murlocs near their hideout might have it.
completionDialogue: You found it! Wait... this is just a murloc eye. Those creatures are disgusting! Well, at least you tried. Here, take this for your trouble.
